item.title: 智能显微镜演示
item.description: 这是我们的产品视频。 var playerElement = document.getElementById("player-wrapper"); var player = new Clappr.Player({ source: "https://cloud.video.taobao.com//play/u/378629488/p/1/e/6/t/1/306064190700.mp4", mute: true, height: 360, width: 640 }); player.attachTo(playerElement);
